titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for remoouing the staple of woolls from parts beyond the seas, vnto certaine principall cities and townes within this our realme
Proclamations. 1619-03-12
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Burley on the Hill the foure and twentieth day of March, in the fourteenth yeere of our raigne ..
The year date is given according to Lady Day dating.
A variant of STC 8552 with sheet 3 reset; sheet 3, line 1 ends "Authori-".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
